tool_description: API for showing all characters and their details in diferents arcs
name: Jojos Api
title: Jojos Api

api_list.name: GET the details of a stand
api_list.description: Get the details of a stand
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jojos-api.p.rapidapi.com/stand/The_World"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jojos-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://jojos-api.p.rapidapi.com/stand/{standid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jojos-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET character detail

api_list.name: GET all the characters from a specific arc
api_list.description: The characters from arc {id} will be shown, the last digit of the url indicates the arc
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jojos-api.p.rapidapi.com/arc_characters/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jojos-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://jojos-api.p.rapidapi.com/arc_characters/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jojos-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
